#summary Web interface for work with surveys and tests

= Description =

Login form:<br />http://www.skost.lviv.ua/files/i/9.jpg

Web site consist of several pages.
 # *Start poll* - here you can pass an survey<br />http://www.skost.lviv.ua/files/i/10.jpg<br />
 # *Poll editor* - This is a page where you can edit(create, delete, update) surveys.<br />_*Notes:*_<br />_This page is based on jQuery technology_<br />_You must be authorized as admin for view this page_<br />http://www.skost.lviv.ua/files/i/0.jpg<br />
 # *Widget* - You can create your own survey and make it in your site<br />http://www.skost.lviv.ua/files/i/11.jpg<br />Widget statistics:<br />http://www.skost.lviv.ua/files/i/12.jpg<br />
 # *Statistics* - Here you can see poll statistics(only for tests). You may switch from test statistic to user statistic. You also can discover a statistics chart.<br />http://www.skost.lviv.ua/files/i/13.jpg

= Technologies used =

 * _*SQLite*_ database
 * Chart from _*Google*_
 * _*jQuery*_ librairy (jquery-1.3.1.min.js)
 * _*Visual Studio 2008*_ as developpement environement
 * _*C#*_ as developpement language
